messages.subject: Hi! New to group.  Anyone from Rochester?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I have 4 kids ages 9,7,4 and 2 years old. My oldest 2 just finished public school and we have just started our unschooling ! I started looking into
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

I have 4 kids ages 9,7,4 and 2 years old. My oldest 2 just finished
public school and we have just started our "unschooling"! I
started looking into homeschooling and read John Holt's
books and they had a huge impact on me. My oldest dd is
dyslexic and was really struggling in school and her confidence was
getting lower by the day. I really hope to turn that around and make
learning fun again! We live in Rochester and are looking for some
homeschooling friends :) But we also plan on taking a lot of field
trips to the cities!

Christine
